title: Technology-enhanced learning-based vocational competency development program for social sectors

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and understanding of basic social science concepts
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented program for professionals, emphasizing real-time interaction and project-based assessments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can conduct projects analyzing social issues occurring inside and outside the classroom using technological tools
Learners can achieve at least 80% of learning objectives through knowledge sharing with peers using online collaboration tools
Learners can propose actionable solutions for social phenomena based on data collected in digital environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
